plot: This film follows a climbing tour in the Alps, one of the most difficult tours in the world, in a stark and detailed manner.
title: Dokumentation einer Unzweckmäßigkeit
plot_es: This film follows a climbing tour in the Alps, one of the most difficult tours in the world, in a stark and detailed manner.
